name: vscode-workspace-finder
title: VSCode Workspace Finder
description: Directly open VSCode workspaces from Raycast!

commands.name: index
commands.title: Code
commands.description: Find and open VSCode workspaces quickly!
commands.subtitle: Find workspaces

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: yugveer_wadzatia
